Articles.Content: I'd like links to all the realistic mods. I want to challenge myself. I have heard of Real Solar System, but I also heard that you need some other mods. Can anyone provide a list of all realistic mods?

What's up with people demanding lists nowadays? Where have you looked and what mods have you discovered on your own? It would probably help if you tried to be as complete as possible yourself.

You can not expect others to make efforts for you if you do not display any yourself

RSS

FAR

DRE

Real Fuels

Stretchy Tanks

Real Chutes

TAC or ECLSS life support

Engine Ignitor

RT2

Those are the mods I would say are needed for a 75% close to reality mod as you are going to get.

No no, I am not demanding anything. I am simply asking for a list. I have school so I couldn't find them myself at the moment. And when I came back. Someone may have given me a list so I do not have to spend much time on it.

Real fuels

Ferram aerospace

Tac life support

Well those are some of the realistic mods that i know of.
Sarbian's link does it all for you, basically.

You can find most proven mods here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library

Select the ones that match your own personal definition of 'realistic' in a game about semi-immortal spacefrogs.

If you want total realism, you might want to start looking at Principia, an N-body mod. However, IIRC it doesn't allow thrust while in N-body mode, meaning you have to switch to normal Newtonian mode.
